actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

traits.description: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
traits.name: Keen Sight

traits.description: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.name: Pack Tactics
